edu.stanford.cfuller.imageanalysistools.parameters

Class ParameterXMLWriter

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class ParameterXMLWriter
extends ParameterXMLParser
    Utilites for writing existing analysis parameters to XML files.
    Author:
    cfuller

    • Method Detail

      • writeParameterDictionaryToXMLFile

        public void writeParameterDictionaryToXMLFile(ParameterDictionary pd,
                                     java.lang.String filename)
        Writes the parameters in a ParameterDictionary to an XML file that can be read at a later time by a ParameterXMLParser. Note that if this is used to write parameters back to disk that were originally read from an XML file, this may not preserve the type of those parameters, dependent on the implementation of the ParameterDictionary.
        Parameters:
        pd - The ParameterDictionary to write to XML.
        filename - The full path and filename to the XML file that will be written.

      • writeParameterListToXMLFile

        public void writeParameterListToXMLFile(java.util.List<Parameter> parameters,
                               java.lang.String filename)
        Writes the parameters in a List of Parameter objects to an XML file that can be read at a later time by a ParameterXMLParser.
        Parameters:
        parameters - The List of Parameters to write to XML.
        filename - The full path and filename to the XML file that will be written.
